name: Tiki Torture: The core of Antioch
name_original: Tiki Torture: The core of Antioch
description:
The god of Antioch is ANGRI and he wants sacrifices! Follow your minimap to find the sacrifices on the camp! and toss them into the volcano before its's too late and the island is flooded!
